abstract: Shares in Commercial Metals gained 4.3 percent on Tuesday, closing at $14.69, although they remain below the $15 a share that Carl C. Icahn is offering for the company.
snippet: Shares in Commercial Metals gained 4.3 percent on Tuesday, closing at $14.69, although they remain below the $15 a share that Carl C. Icahn is offering for the company.

headline.main: Minor Bounce for Commercial Metals as Icahn Goes Hostile

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
